title: split_h5mu
description: Split the samples of a single modality from a .h5mu (multimodal) sample into seperate .h5mu files based on the values of an .obs column of this modality.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.output`, example: `/path/to/output`. Output directory containing multiple h5mu files
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.output`, example: `/path/to/output`. Output directory containing multiple h5mu files.

output_compression.description: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object
output_compression.help_text: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object.

output_files.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output_files.csv`, example: `sample_files.csv`. A csv containing the base filename and obs feature by which it was split
output_files.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output_files.csv`, example: `sample_files.csv`. A csv containing the base filename and obs feature by which it was split.

input.description: Type: `file`, required. Path to a single
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required. Path to a single .h5mu file.

obs_feature.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `celltype`. The .obs column to split the mudata on.

drop_obs_nan.description: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Whether to drop all
drop_obs_nan.help_text: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Whether to drop all .obs columns that contain only nan values after splitting.

ensure_unique_filenames.description: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Append number suffixes to ensure unique filenames after sanitizing obs feature values
ensure_unique_filenames.help_text: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Append number suffixes to ensure unique filenames after sanitizing obs feature values.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
